name: Neoteric UK
description:
Neoteric UK have nine years evolving over that time and strengthened its resolve to produce and always look at ways to improve.
One of Neoteric UK strengths is their excellence in work and a thorough understanding of the latest in internet marketing techniques including social networking and the latest customer statistical analysis. Â Highly professional team of loyal and committed work colleagues. No work is outsourced, even the most creative designs are handled in-house.
